dhp49:2: vaṇṇagandhamaheṭhayaṃ → vaṇṇagandhaṃ aheṭhayaṃ (bj, pts1-2) | vaṇṇavantaṃ agandhakaṃ (s1) | vaṇṇavantaṃ aheṭhayaṃ (s2, s3) | vaṇṇagandhamapoṭhayaṃ (mr)
dhp52:4: hoti kubbato → pakubbato (bj) | sukubbato (s1-3, km) | sakubbato (pts1-2)
dhp56:2: yāyaṃ tagaracandanī → yvāyaṃ tagaracandanī (s1-3) | yvāyaṃ tagaracandanaṃ (c1)
